p: Values of δ 13C leaf ranged from −21.92‰ (collected in 1899) to −28.51‰ (collected in 2017), with a mean of −25.05 ± 1.32‰ (standard deviation; Table S2). Δ leaf values ranged from 15.11‰ to 20.97‰ (mean: 17.93 ± 1.11‰ standard deviation). Minimum, maximum, and mean values for climate variables are shown in Table S2. All data can be found in Table S3.
